amendment.description: To amend part A of title II of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve preparation programs and strengthen support for principals and other school leaders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2151 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2151 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097) To amend part A of title II of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve preparation programs and strengthen support for principals and other school leaders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2151 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2151 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2089.
